name: shcv
description: A command-line tool for managing shell configurations and variables

script: if [ "${ARCH}" = "x86_64" ]; then ARCH="x86_64"; elif [ "${ARCH}" = "arm64" ]; then ARCH="arm64"; fi
RELEASE_URL=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/agentstation/shcv/releases/latest | grep browser_download_url | grep ${OS} | grep ${ARCH} | cut -d '"' -f 4)
